title: Update Project Schedule from Daily Log
description: A PM reviews the daily log and updates the main project schedule based on the reported progress.

tasks.description: Review the latest daily log to identify all tasks reported as 'completed'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies 'Install Windows - 3rd Floor' as completed.

tasks.description: Update the status of the identified task in the Gantt chart to '100% Complete'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task's status is correctly updated in the project schedule.
